cleaned_text: Organic meditation well-being herbal tea - TERRE D'OC - Inspirations d'Intérieurs 10.00 Tax included Organic meditation well-being herbal tea - TERRE D'OC - Inspirations d'Intérieurs A delicious blend of hawthorn and lemon balm to reduce restlessness, tension and irritability, to concentrate and let go during a meditation session, associated with the soothing sweetness of immortelle flower and ylang-ylang essential oil. Weight: 40g Ingredients: hawthorn * 52%, chamomile flower * 27.25%, flower petals *, lemon balm leaf *, natural tangerine flavor *, natural orange flavor *, essential oils 0.75% (tangerine *, sweet orange *). * ingredients from organic farming. Dosage 1 cc/250 ml Temps d'infusion 5 minutes Température
